public ref class StylusPointProperties abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含 WPF 支持的每个属性的 。

span.span: Contains a for each property that the WPF supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附带了预定义通常由触笔与数字化器收集的属性的对象。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ships with pre-defined objects for properties that are commonly collected by a stylus and a digitizer. 你可以使用这些内置属性创建。You can use these built-in properties to create a . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建使用字段。The following example demonstrates how to create a using the fields. [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty AltitudeOrientation
Public Shared ReadOnly AltitudeOrientation As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ AltitudeOrientation;

summary.span: 表示笔轴和 Tablet PC 图面之间的角度。

span.span: Represents the angle between the axis of the pen and the surface of the Tablet PC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值笔垂直到图面时，触笔是相似的面和 90 时，为 0。The value of is 0 when the pen is parallel to the surface and 90 when the pen is perpendicular to the surface. 反转触笔时，这些值为负数。The values are negative when the pen is inverted.

span.span: Represents the clockwise rotation of the cursor, through a full circular range around the z-axis.

summary.span: 表示数字化仪上接触点的高度。

span.span: Represents the height of the contact point on the digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联系点的高度依赖于使用的检测的类型。The height of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used. 值使用触摸设备时可能会不同。The value of can vary when Touch is used.

summary.span: 表示笔尖垂直于 Tablet PC 图面的压力。

span.span: Represents the pressure of the pen tip perpendicular to the Tablet PC surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PacketStatus;
.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PacketStatus
Public Shared ReadOnly PacketStatus As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ PacketStatus;

summary.span: 表示光标的当前状态。

span.span: Represents the current status of the cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值字段包含一个或多个位域中的以下标志值。The value of the field contains one or more of the following flag values in a bit field. 使用位运算符来检查这些值的状态。Use bit operators to check the status of these values. - 光标正在触及的绘图图面的 (值 = 1)。The cursor is touching the drawing surface (Value = 1). - 反转光标。The cursor is inverted. 例如，橡皮擦结束的笔指向图面 (值 = 2)。For example, the eraser end of the pen is pointing toward the surface (Value = 2). - 未使用 (值 = 4)。Not used (Value = 4). - 按下桶形按钮 (值 = 8)。The barrel button is pressed (Value = 8).

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PitchRotation;
.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty PitchRotation
Public Shared ReadOnly PitchRotation As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ PitchRotation;

summary.span: 表示笔尖是高于还是低于与写入图面垂直的水平线。

span.span: Represents whether the tip is above or below a horizontal line that is perpendicular to the writing surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 这要求三维数字化仪。This requires a three-dimensional digitizer. 值是如果提示高于行正值和负值如果它低于行。The value is positive if the tip is above the line and negative if it is below the line. 例如，如果您保存面前的笔和假想的墙上写入，音调为正如果提示位于你将扩展到墙上插座线上方。For example, if you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, the pitch is positive if the tip is above a line extending from you to the wall.

summary.span: 表示笔绕其自转轴进行顺时针旋转。

span.span: Represents the clockwise rotation of the pen around its own axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 这要求三维数字化仪。This requires a three-dimensional digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段表示沿 Tablet PC 图面的平面的压力。The field represents pressure along the plane of the Tablet PC surface. 字段表示与 Tablet PC 图面的平面垂直的压力。The field represents pressure perpendicular to the plane of the Tablet PC surface.

span.span: Represents the width of the contact point on the digitizer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 联系点的宽度取决于使用的检测的类型。The width of the contact point depends on the type of instrument that is used. 值使用触摸设备时可能会不同。The value of can vary when touch is used.

summary.span: 表示笔水平时与其水平轴中心点的左或右偏转度。

span.span: Represents the angle of the pen to the left or right around the center of its horizontal axis when the pen is horizontal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 这要求三维数字化仪。This requires a three-dimensional digitizer. 如果保留在你和假想的墙上写入之前的笔，零旋转指示触笔与墙垂直。If you hold the pen in front of you and write on an imaginary wall, zero yaw indicates that the pen is perpendicular to the wall. 值是垂直的负提示是否垂直左侧和右侧提示是否正。The value is negative if the tip is to the left of perpendicular and positive if the tip is to the right of perpendicular.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty YTiltOrientation;
.field public static initonly class System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty YTiltOrientation
Public Shared ReadOnly YTiltOrientation As StylusPointProperty
public: static initonly System::Windows::Input::StylusPointProperty ^ YTiltOrientation;

summary.span: 表示 (x, z) 平面与笔和 X 轴平面之间的角度。

span.span: Represents the angle between the (x, z) plane and the pen and x-axis plane.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这适用于笔光标。This applies to a pen cursor. 笔垂直的绘图图面时，值为 0。The value is 0 when the pen is perpendicular to the drawing surface. 笔向上或离开用户时，值为正。The value is positive when the pen is upward or away from the user.

summary.span: 表示 Z 坐标或笔尖与 Tablet 图面之间的距离。

span.span: Represents the z-coordinate or distance of the pen tip from the tablet surface.
